text: Tyancyasathi nehami nehami asanari jannata ahe. Ticyakhali nadya vahata asatila. Tithe yanna suvarna kankana ghatale ja'ila. Ani hiravya rangace talama va jada resamace kapade ghalatila tya thikani sinhasanavara takke lavuna basatila. Kiti cangala mobadala ahe ani kiti cangale arama karanyace ghara ahe
